About.paragraph: Hi, my name is Maximillian Kwun-Tran. Welcome to my domain. I am a self-taught software developer and professional barber. Expressing creativity and individuality through my work is my passion. In 2021, I founded my own barbershop in San Jose, CA. While I was building the website for the shops and running scripts to analyze our data, I discovered my affinity for software development.
About.paragraph2: Although the shop was thriving, I found myself on many nights pondering and exploring computer science. After almost two years, I decided that I wanted to pursue a development career, and some day start my own tech company. In the fall of 2022, I realized my shops full potential through a successful sale, cut down to part time as a barber, and began my journey as a full time software engineer.
About.paragraph3: Life after graduation has been one wonderful and exciting roller coaster. I have had the opportunity to meet so many amazing people along the way. I want to give a special thanks to my clients and all those who have supported me throughout my career. If you're reading this, please don't ever hesitate to reach out and connect.

Timeline.text: Graduated with a B.B.A. in Finance and Investment Analytics, Magna Cum Laude.
Began my career as a barber. Made many lifelong friends and connections along the way.
Accepted a second job as a CA Peace Officer for the Santa Clara County Probation Department.
Learned a few software development tools to improve my business. Curiousity and side projects eventually grew into passion.
Took a chance, resigned from officer duties, and opened up my own barbershop! It was the learning experience of a lifetime. Made even more friends and memories.

Timeline.name: 2022 and Beyond
Timeline.text: Sold my shop to pursue tech full time. I still cut part time during the week so feel free to book an appointment!

Contact.address: 28 N Almaden Ave, San Jose, CA 95110
